text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor Well it's because the Mayor of NYC understands about Racism.  Your just well kinda a racist.  AND you do nothing about surging covid-19 cases let alone understand what the whole black life matters mean.  Look in the mirror find the ugly truth.
